entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vaughan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:09 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 2:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: E 29 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 4.
